title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {reuse: Reuse R Objects},   author = {Mauro Lepore},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/maurolepore/reuse, https://maurolepore.github.io/reuse/}, }

title: Reuse R Objects
text: can install development version reuse like :

title: Reuse R Objects
text: plays well pipe. saves computations, reusing cache possible. can overwrite cache one call argument overwrite. can overwrite cache one session option reuse.overwrite. default uses appropriate directory Linux, Mac, Windows, via rappdirs package. ’s based pins package, can use manage cached objects.
code: library(reuse) one <- 1 %>% reuse("one") #> Guessing `type = 'rds'` #> Creating new version '20220330T184316Z-10a5d' #> Writing to pin 'one' two <- 2 %>% reuse("one") two #> [1] 1 two <- 2 %>% reuse("one", overwrite = TRUE) #> Guessing `type = 'rds'` #> Replacing version '20220330T184316Z-10a5d' with '20220330T184316Z-30a9b' #> Writing to pin 'one' two #> [1] 2 options(reuse.overwrite = TRUE)  three <- 3 %>% reuse("one") #> Guessing `type = 'rds'` #> Replacing version '20220330T184316Z-30a9b' with '20220330T184316Z-30ea3' #> Writing to pin 'one' three #> [1] 3 cache_dir <- rappdirs::user_cache_dir("reuse") list.files(cache_dir) #> [1] "one" library(pins) pin_delete(board = board_folder(cache_dir), names = "one") list.files(cache_dir) #> character(0)

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Reuse R objects — reuse
code: reuse(   x,   name,   board = pins::board_folder(rappdirs::user_cache_dir("reuse")),   overwrite = getOption("reuse.overwrite", default = FALSE) )

title: Reuse R objects — reuse
text: x object (typically data frame) pin. name Pin name. board pin board, created board_folder(), board_rsconnect(), board_url() another board_ function. overwrite Logical. Overwrite cache?

title: Reuse R objects — reuse
code: one <- 1 %>% reuse("one") #> Guessing `type = 'rds'` #> Creating new version '20220330T190636Z-10a5d' #> Writing to pin 'one' two <- 2 %>% reuse("one") two #> [1] 1  two <- 2 %>% reuse("one", overwrite = TRUE) #> Guessing `type = 'rds'` #> Replacing version '20220330T190636Z-10a5d' with '20220330T190636Z-30a9b' #> Writing to pin 'one' two #> [1] 2
